remarks:
Conjoin antecedents and consequents of two premises.  This is the closed theorem form of ~ anim12d .  Theorem *3.47 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 113. It was proved by Leibniz, and it evidently pleased him enough to call it _praeclarum theorema_ (splendid theorem).  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Apr-2013.)
